Shipping and Delivery

Thank you for shopping with IberTechSystems. Please review our shipping and delivery policies to ensure a smooth and timely delivery of your products.

1. Shipping Methods

We offer several shipping options for your convenience. The following methods are available:

Shipping Method Estimated Delivery Time Shipping Cost
Standard Shipping 3-5 Business Days Free for orders over $100
Expedited Shipping 1-3 Business Days $15
Overnight Shipping Next Business Day $30

2. Order Processing

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days. Orders placed after 3 PM or on weekends will be processed the following business day. You will receive an email confirmation with tracking information once your order has shipped.

3. Shipping Restrictions

We currently ship to the following locations:

  • United States
  • Canada
  • European Union
  • Australia
  • Other international destinations on request

For orders outside of these regions, please contact us for a custom shipping quote.

4. Shipping Fees

Shipping fees are calculated based on the weight, size, and destination of your order. Free shipping is available for orders over $100 within the United States. For expedited and overnight shipping, additional charges apply.

5. Tracking Your Order

Once your order has been shipped, you will receive an email with tracking information. You can track your package through the carrier’s website or by clicking the tracking link provided in the email.

6. Damaged or Lost Shipments

If your order is damaged or lost in transit, please contact us within 7 days of receiving the product. We will assist you with filing a claim and arranging for a replacement or refund. IberTechSystems is not responsible for damages or losses caused by the carrier.

7. International Shipping

For international orders, customs fees, taxes, and duties may apply. These charges are the responsibility of the customer. IberTechSystems is not responsible for any delays caused by customs processing.

8. Returns and Exchanges

If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please refer to our Return and Exchange Policy for instructions on how to initiate a return or exchange. Please note that shipping fees for returns are the customer’s responsibility, unless the product is defective or damaged upon arrival.

9. Contact Us

If you have any questions or need assistance with your order, please contact our customer support team:

Email: support@ibertechsystems.com

Phone: +123-456-7890

© 2025 IberTechSystems. All rights reserved.
